boardgame.name: Warped Kart Racers
boardgame.description: Race and battle - solo or multiplayer - with the stars from American Dad!, Family Guy, King of the Hill and Solar Opposites!

boardgame.name: Exorcista
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

La grabación de audio de un supuesto exorcismo católico emitida por un podcast dedicado al misterio y el terror hace saltar las alarmas del AAM de la Ordo Veritatis. Parece que el exorcista está invitando a entidades de la oscuridad exterior a penetrar en este mundo, empleando a la víctima de la posesión como portal de entrada. La Ordo intercepta el audio con apenas unos cientos de escuchas y pone a los personajes jugadores a trabajar sobre el campo.
boardgame.rpgseries: Historias de más allá del Velo

boardgame.name: Dark Ages: Vampire Promotional Booklet
boardgame.description:
From the back of the booklet:

A New Chapter in the History of the World of Darkness!

Spring 2002

Coming in May 2002, look for the brand new Dark Ages: Vampire in both a reagalar and deluxe limited edition printing. The Long Night is over for the Cainites of the Dark Medieval world, and the Old Ways are being studied in new light.

Sommer 2002

Starting in June, look for the Dark Ages Storyteller Companion and Dark Ages: Europe, two sourcebooks designed to help make the Dark Medieval setting come to life in your stories.
Dark Ages Storyteller Companion - June 2002
Dark Ages: Europe - August 2002

Fall 2002

Then, in October, look for the first of the books dedicated to the vampiric roads, the disciplined studies and rigid beliefs that help Cainites cope with or resist the urges of the Beast.
Road of the Beast - October 2002
Road of Kings - November 2002

And...

Im July 2002, check your local bookstore for the first installment of the Dark Ages Clan Novel Series. Spanning the breadth of the Dark Medieval world over multiple decades, this monumental series follows in the tradition of the hit Vampire: The Masquerade Clan Novel Series. Each novel follows the exploits of the most prominent members of each clan as the Long Night ends and the War of Princes begins. Some of your favorite Cainite characters appear here, as do some relative
newcomers with uncertain futures.
While each novel stands on its own and tells a self-contained story, each story is also a part of a much larger epic that begins in the ashes of Constantinople and casts a shadow into the modern nights.
This epic series begins in July with Nosteratu.

boardgame.name: Funerario
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

En la operación anterior, Exorccista los personajes se toparon con la mención de la funeraria Átropos en la bolsa que contenía el cuerpo de un tatuador y en un borrador de correo, dirigido al esoterrorista «Funerario». Demasiadas «coincidencias» para el gusto de la Ordo Veritatis. El equipo debe investigar esta funeraria y los secretos que esconde Green Hill Cemetery.
boardgame.rpgseries: Historias de más allá del Velo

boardgame.name: Alienista
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Entre los líquidos alquímicos de la funeraria Átropos, los agentes de la Ordo Veritatis encontraron una etiqueta de envío a un apartado de correos de una ciudad lejana. Los personajes deben investigar la recogida del paquete mientras la ciudad se prepara para el traslado de un famoso asesino en serie de los ochenta.
boardgame.rpgseries: Historias de más allá del Velo

boardgame.name: Artista
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Tras seguir la pista de las obras de arte del Alienista, los agentes de la Ordo viajan hasta una escuela de artes en medio de la montaña, donde esculturas, cuadros y piezas musicales no son lo que parecen a primera vista, y las desconchadas paredes del internado esconden un terrible secreto.
boardgame.rpgseries: Historias de más allá del Velo

boardgame.name: Artesano
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Tras acabar con la amenaza esoterrorista en la escuela Valaravans, el equipo de agentes de la Ordo se dirige a un sospechoso hostal cercano a un monasterio cuyas campanas tañen a horas intempestivas. ¿Lograrán los personajes jugadores descubrir el siguiente miembro de Hades.net?
boardgame.rpgseries: Historias de más allá del Velo

boardgame.name: Asesino
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Las actividades de un tal John en torno a la trama del Artesano, puso en alerta a la Ordo en su persecución de los miembros de Hades.net. Pero los agentes que lo vigilaban han desaparecido y ahora los personajes jugadores deben ocupar su lugar y descubrir qué ha pasado y avanzar en la investigación... o acabar como ellos.
boardgame.rpgseries: Historias de más allá del Velo

boardgame.name: Contrabandista
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Gracias al éxito de las misiones anteriores, la Ordo Veritatis tiene una pista fiable acercadel siguiente eslabón de la conspiración siniestra, el Contrabandista, que conduce a una sala de subastas. Los agentes deberán descubrir quién se esconde tras ese nombre y cuáles son sus planes, antes de que sea demasiado tarde.
boardgame.rpgseries: Historias de más allá del Velo

boardgame.name: Maestre
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

El cerco sobre Hades.net se estrecha. La Ordo Veritatis está muy cerca de dar caza al último eslabón de la conspiración siniestra: Maestre. Pero el líder esoterrorista haactivado al última parte de su plan y algo terrible está a punto de ocurrir. Los agentes deberán enfrentarse a una carrera contrarreloj si quieren evitarlo.
boardgame.rpgseries: Historias de más allá del Velo

boardgame.name: Brokers: The Stock Trading Game
boardgame.description:
Brokers is a game where players role play as an intern investing a client's retirement fund. Each round of the game, players are presented with the current market conditions and must make strategic decisions on what to buy, sell, or hold in order to increase the value of their client's portfolio. Players must push their luck to squeeze out as much money as possible before the inevitable market crash as only cash on hand is important once the market tanks. Do you have what it takes to beat out the other interns and impress the boss? Try it out in Brokers: The Stock Trading Game.

Setup includes randomly selecting 3 event cards including the Market Crash event and mixing them. Then 5 or 6 cards (depending on the number of players is add on top of these 3 cards. This is the event deck. The Stock Summary Sheets are placed in the play area and the price deck for each is shuffled and the top card of each is played face up on top of the corresponding Stock Summary Sheet. A marker token is placed on each Stock Summary Sheet for on the price listed on its current price card. The Energy stock does not have a price deck and instead has its marking token placed on 155. Each player is given a set of action cards which includes 3 buys, 3 sells, 2 praises and 2 critiques. Each player is given a starting portfolio of $150, and share of 2 Retail, 2 Venture Capital, 2 Energy, and 2 Manufacturing stock certificates. Players receive additional $150 on turns 2 and 3. One player is selected as the Lead Intern.

The game is played in up to 8 or 9 rounds depending on the number of players and each round an event is played which alters the rules of play for that round. Each round players secretly plan which 3 action cards they will play and players reveal their actions together. The player with the Lead Intern card starts playing 1 or 2 action cards for a single stock type and each player does the same taking turns going clockwise until all actions are played. The action cards players choose influence the order of decisions that the other players make. As players buy shares the price increases for the next player. As players sell share the price of decreases for the next player. If a player plays a praise card, the price increases by two values. If a player plays a critique card, the price decreases by two values.

Once all actions are played, players collect exclusive roles for fulfilling specific portfolio requirements. The Major Retail shareholder role gives the player double dividends for retail shares. The Major Manufacturing shareholder gives the player an extra sell action each round. The Major Venture Capital shareholder role gives the player a free share of Venture Capital each round. The Most Diversified Portfolio role give the player an extra $25 dividend for having at least one of each stock and the greatest number of stocks among all the players.

After roles are collected or redistributed, players collect dividends for owning the stocks in their portfolios, and then the Lead Intern card is passed to the next player clockwise. The game ends at the end of the round when the Market Crash event occurs. At that point, the player with the highest cash score (not share value) wins the game.

boardgame.name: Cosmos: Empires
boardgame.description:
Cosmos: Empires is a 2-8 player, 15-45 minute engine building card game. Jump into the galaxy, choose your strategy and build your galactic empire. Race against your friends, exploiting their economy to your advantage!

The game is played with a single deck, from which 10 cards are drawn into the “pool” players can select and build cards from. Each card has a cost, roll value and production value.

Each turn, the current player gets 2 actions and then rolls 2 D4 (4 sided dice). The current player can use one of their actions to increase or decrease the total of the two dice by one. Then, each player with a card with a Roll value equal to the new total gets Credits equal to the same cards production value.

Finally, the current player can use their remaining actions to build a card from the card pool (or “cycle” it and take credits).

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Tomb of the Vampire General
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Into The Tomb

You step into the dank cave clutching your torch, wishing the light would shine a little brighter or the shadows would retreat more—the water, flowing in the entrance with you, pools on one half of the dig site. The cave stretches on beyond, so you decide to stick to the dry side and keep moving. Did you slip? No, something pulled you, oh saints! A group of decrepit vampires emerges from the icy depths and attack. Outnumbered, you survey the melee to find your ally has fallen. They are dragging her further into the cave! After them!

boardgame.name: Sorchi's Curious Places: Ten Points of Interest for RPG - Volume I
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Sorchi’s Curious Places: Ten Points of Interest for RPG (Vol. 1) contains ten places to visit for the intrepid adventurer. Each system-agnostic destination comes with a custom illustration and three D10 tables (explaining who is doing something, what they are doing, and why they are doing it at the site). Use them as inspiration for adventures, locations in your campaign, traveling goals, en-route destinations, and the illustrations as handouts. This volume loosely follows the theme: “on the borderland.”

Contents:

Coastal Village
Crater Town
Desert Caves
Embassy
Giant Bones
Interdimensional Grimoire
Mountain Temple
Skull Citadel
Sky Ruins
Sphere Cities


Bear in mind that the provided material will only give you the most rudimentary outline for your own adventures. This publication is for you if you want playful, colorful illustrations combined with ideas and a foundation for your DIY adventure.

boardgame.name: Dreaming City of Kahudbar
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The 10th issue of Populated Hexes Monthly remains at the base of the Plateau of Leng and visits the Dreaming City of Kahudbar, the only place where the mysterious Denizens of Leng meet to trade with humanity. Includes stats for the Leng-folk as well as the valuable moon-rubies the Denizens use to trade.

boardgame.name: Pecking Order
boardgame.description:
In this fun, fast-paced game, players play their cards simultaneously, quickly see which colour appears on the most cards, and then its a race to grab the totem pole with the correct colour nearest the top before anyone else can get to it.

It’s everyone for themselves!

—description from the publisher

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Star Wars: X-Wing (Second Edition) – Battle of Yavin Scenario Pack
boardgame.description: Players can recreate one of the most iconic Star Wars battles with this new product for Star Wars: X-Wing! The Battle of Yavin Scenario Pack puts players in the middle of this climatic battle with unique rules that cast one player as the Rebels desperately attempting to destroy the Death Star with a successful trench run and the other player leading the Imperial defense. Featuring 20 new cards that combine pilots and upgrades into a standard loadout, this pack gives players plenty of ways to customize their squadron and experience this thrilling battle over and over again!
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Game: Star Wars X-Wing Miniatures Game

boardgame.name: DC Comics HeroClix: Batman and His Greatest Foes Fast Forces
boardgame.description:
The DC Comics HeroClix: Batman and His Greatest Foes Fast Forces features all-new dial designs including Batman along with the most iconic characters from his rogues gallery— The Joker, Harley Quinn, Mr. Freeze, The Riddler and The Penguin. As a bonus, the DC Comics HeroClix: Batman and His Greatest Foes Fast Forces Pack includes an exclusive 3D Harley’s Hammer object with card!!

HeroClix Fast Forces packs are designed for quick play and easy team-building for both tournaments and casual games.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: DC Comics HeroClix: World's Finest Booster Brick
boardgame.description:
The DC Comics HeroClix: World’s Finest set features heroes and villains from the Superman/Batman comics as well as three major sub-themes of the Metal Men, the misfit heroes of the Doom Patrol and a mystical sub-theme that includes well-known magic users such as Jason Blood as well as a collection of generic magic/supernatural characters such as witches, warlocks, apprentices and demons.

Each DC Comics HeroClix: World’s Finest Booster Brick contains ten (10) 5-figure booster packs.

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: DC Comics HeroClix: 15th Anniversary Elseworlds Starter Set
DC Comics HeroClix: Batman Animated Series Starter Set
DC Comics HeroClix: Justice League Unlimited Starter Set

boardgame.name: CSI Board Game
boardgame.description:
This is the first CSI board game to include all THREE SHOWS in one game (CSI, CSI Miami and CSI New York) and the first CSI board game to feature UNLIMITED GAMEPLAY.

There is a different outcome every time you play the game.

As a CSI team member, you roll dice to travel through the streets of Las Vegas, Miami and New York looking for the evidence and suspect you need to solve your case.

To solve a case, you must complete one of your three CASE CARDS. To complete your CASE CARD, move around the board to collect all three pieces of EVIDENCE on the card, collect (recruit) one of the three CSI TEAM MEMBERS on the card, and find your SUSPECT.

Take the completed case to the corresponding DETECTIVE on the CASE CARD to put your SUSPECT in jail and win the game.
boardgame.boardgamefamily: TV Shows: CSI – Crime Scene Investigation

boardgame.name: Creature Cache
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A compendium of over 200 monsters, statted up for classic editions of the world’s original role-playing game and comparable retro-clones (OSE, B/X, BECMI, LL).

Since the birth of the hobby, pulp stories have been an inspiration for both the game as a whole, but especially the creatures that populate its world. Thanks to illustrators like Virgil Finlay, Frank R. Paul, and Margaret Brundage, those creatures took shape not only in the mind, but on the page as well.

Undertaken as a quarantine project in 2020 and inspired by the images produced by a host of legends of pulp illustration, this volume attempts to capture the spirit of the early days of the hobby. The result—a compendium of over 200 monsters, statted up for classic editions of the world’s original role-playing game and comparable retro-clones.

boardgame.name: Soudesu, Buying and Selling on the Dark Web
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Welcome to #iHunt Season Five, tentatively called, "You can't spell Happy without App."

It's about some of the other apps in the #iHunt universe. Worldbuilding, player options, story seeds, all that jazz.

This one is Soudesu, which is a dark web shopping site for crafters, artifact hoarders, and hunting tool aficionados.

Here's what's inside:

Dark Web Intellectuals. This is a new hunter kink full of people who dig deep into the bowels of the web and come up with... nasty shit.
Antiquarians. These are... monsters? Kinda? They're people so obsessed with occult artifacts that it starts to mutate their very being. It's like Hoarders meets Friday the 13th The Series. No, I don't expect you to get that reference point.
Editors' Picks. This is nine items pulled from the Soudesu listings. Including rare out of print collectible card game cards that incite violence, to a digital pet toy that happen to house the soul of a brilliant scientist, to church indulgences that actually erase your sins.

boardgame.name: El bosque de espinos
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

El Gran Duque de Vafordin ha enviado a todos los bardos de la comarca en busca de ayuda. Su misión es recorrer plazas y tabernas recitando la triste historia de Groundstone, el pueblo cubierto de espinas, para reclutar a aventureros que la salven de la maldición.
¿Os atrevéis a formar parte del grupo de héroes que se internará en el bosque hechizado y luchará con criaturas de savia mortal para romper el encantamiento?
boardgame.rpgdesigner: Ana Belén Herrera de la Cruz
boardgame.rpgproducer: Ana Belén Herrera de la Cruz

boardgame.name: Por el bien común
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Acabáis de echar de Garedoth a un grupo de bandidos que tenía atemorizado al pueblo. Para celebrarlo, los lugareños han organizado una fiesta en honor vuestro. Entre cerveza y cerveza os hablan del fantasma del molino abandonado y como todavía os quedan ganas de acción decidís ir a investigar. Sin que os deis cuenta os veréis envueltos en una nueva aventura en la que tendréis que erradicar un mal tan antiguo como el bosque mismo.
boardgame.rpgproducer: Ana Belén Herrera de la Cruz

boardgame.name: El augurio
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

En la plaza del pueblo de Mirwell, en un remoto lugar entre las montañas, se está celebrando una reunión. Lo que empezó siendo una congregación amistosa se está tornando poco a poco en una discusión que puede acabar en combate mortal. Una exploradora humana, un cíclope, dos centauros y vosotros, todos envueltos en el misterio de un antiguo augurio que puede acabar con la paz entre los clanes locales. Debéis desentrañar el enigma, allí, en esa plaza, y ahora.
boardgame.rpgproducer: Ana Belén Herrera de la Cruz

boardgame.name: La velada más inesperada
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Os despertáis tirados al final de un camino. No sabéis cómo habéis llegado hasta allí. Lo que sí recordáis es que estabais viajando con vuestro amigo brujo Rapsag… ¿dónde está? No hay rastro de él. Comienza una tormenta eléctrica salvaje y, entre relámpago y relámpago, veis que hay algo extraño a vuestro alrededor: las gotas de lluvias tienen reflejos multicolores, las montañas en la lejanía son de piedra rosada y los árboles no superan la altura de un humano. Suenan siete campanadas y a lo lejos brillan las luces de un pueblo…
boardgame.rpgproducer: Ana Belén Herrera de la Cruz

boardgame.name: El peso de la culpa
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Viejos rencores, codicia, alianzas secretas, bárbaros acechando a las puertas y una espada demoníaca. La reunión que ha convocado Aravius en su castillo es una bola de fuego a punto de estallar y vosotros estáis invitados. ¿Sobreviviréis a ese oscuro conciliábulo?
boardgame.rpgproducer: Ana Belén Herrera de la Cruz

boardgame.name: Un rescate pasado por agua
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

El viejo Nager ha sido secuestrado por unos bandidos y en su aldea os han contratado para que lo rescatéis. Lo que parece una tarea rutinaria para unos aventureros experimentados como vosotros se convertirá en un camino lleno de misterios en el que el único elemento certero al que os podéis aferrar es el río que cruza este bosque.
boardgame.rpgproducer: Ana Belén Herrera de la Cruz

boardgame.name: La dama de los ojos grises
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

En un valle envuelto en el invierno eterno, unos aventureros deberán llegar hasta la Dama de Ojos Grises para pactar con ella el final del frío y, de paso, rescatar a un misterioso mago. La furia del clima y algunos enemigos inesperados no harán fácil el camino…
boardgame.rpgproducer: Ana Belén Herrera de la Cruz

boardgame.name: Ecos de leyenda
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

En Riscomúrice, una isla de leyenda en los confines del mar Ciencorales, se esconde el Descanso de los ancestros, un centro de poder arcano de incalculable valor. Un grupo de héroes deberá internarse en las profundidades de la isla en busca de este misterioso lugar. Durante el camino, deberán enfrentarse a los habitantes de la isla y a sus propios demonios, mientras una figura etérea les observa desde la distancia, dispuesta a ayudarles o quizás a enfrentarles entre sí.
boardgame.rpgproducer: Ana Belén Herrera de la Cruz

boardgame.name: Recuerdos del pasado - Los secretos de Malgus
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

La Torre del Mago está oculta más allá de las sendas olvidadas del bosque. Dicen que alberga oscuros secretos y quizás, algunos tesoros. Explorar la torre os otorgaría un aura de celebridad y también una descarga de riesgo en vuestras venas de aventureros. Aunque nunca es recomendable hurgar mucho en la morada maldita de un mago. Y menos en la de Malgus, «el Aborrecido».
boardgame.rpgproducer: Ana Belén Herrera de la Cruz

boardgame.name: El claro del aquelarre
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

La taberna El Calor del Hogar ha amanecido patas arriba. Una fuerza monstruosa ha destrozado el local y se ha llevado a los nietos del tabernero. Encargados de su búsqueda, los personajes jugadores tendrán que internarse en el bosque y desvelar el secreto escondido en el claro del Aquelarre.
boardgame.rpgproducer: Ana Belén Herrera de la Cruz

boardgame.name: Engastados - La ciudad maldita
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Una enfermedad contagiosa se está extendiendo por la ciudad. Nadie sabe de dónde viene ni se conoce ninguna cura. Cada vez hay más contagiados, enfermos que agonizan en camillas improvisadas. Un grupo de aventureros tendrá que descubrir qué se oculta tras el extraño mal antes de que sea demasiado tarde.

boardgame.name: Noggin
boardgame.description:
In Noggin, players take turns dealing their cards — a combination of letter cards and action cards — equally on three piles. When an action card appears, the other two piles will have letter cards on top, and the action card tells you how to use the two visible letters to create an answer, ideally as quickly as you can!

For example, the letters M and A combined with a "Describe" action card could be answered with "Amazing Magician", whereas a "Name Initial" card might prompt you to say "Muhammed Ali". If you give an answer first that your playing partners agree is credible, you keep that action card. Whoever collects the most action cards wins.

boardgame.name: Cazadores de sombras
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Los aventureros llegan a la apacible posada de El Descanso Real, pero pronto empiezan a sentir algo extraño, una perturbadora sensación de déjà vu. Cuando algunos de los clientes de la posada empiezan a desaparecer, los aventureros reciben la ayuda del Árbol Pálido y descubren la existencia de los Cazadores de Sombras. ¿Conseguirán detener la conspiración que se esconde tras los muros de esta encantadora posada antes de que sea demasiado tarde?

boardgame.name: Iron Lung
boardgame.description: A short horror game where you pilot a tiny submarine through an ocean of blood on an alien moon.

boardgame.name: La apuesta
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Vuestro grupo de aventureros ha decidido tomarse un descanso en la villa de Gliederung. Ninguno ha estado allí antes, pero habéis oído maravillas del lugar: un entorno idílico, numerosas tabernas, muchísimas casas de apuestas… Es un lugar de esparcimiento y desenfreno en el que conviven razas de toda índole en paz y armonía. Es una lástima que justo vosotros hayáis tenido que descubrir su terrible secreto…

boardgame.name: Algo acecha en las Montañas Azules
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Tras contraer una deuda con los bandidos de «el Truhán», los aventureros huyen al pueblo de Kratea, en plenas Montañas Azules. Cuando llegan, les reciben unos carteles de «se busca» con toscos retratos de sus caras. Solo tienen una manera de huir de la Guardia y los bandidos: encontrar al hermano de los enanos Barbablanca que ha desaparecido en plena montaña nevada.

boardgame.name: La estrella errante
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

En la noche estrellada, avanzáis hasta vuestro próximo destino, cerca ya de conseguir un merecido descanso. De repente, algo gigantesco pasa velozmente sobre vuestras cabezas con un ruido ensordecedor. Se estrella a unos cientos de metros de vosotros con una gran explosión que os ciega durante unos segundos y una onda expansiva que os lanza por los aires. Os acercáis y descubrís que se trata de un aparato volador enorme, metálico… y que hay unos restos babosos que se alejan de la nave.

boardgame.name: Cattails: Wildwood Story
boardgame.description:
UNRELEASED GAME – UNAVAILABLE




This game has officially been announced by the publisher or developer, and remains in development. Therefore, some of the game information may change in the future. Until this game is released, please do not submit images for it, nor add new releases. Press Kits are an exception.





Lead your colony of cats into the mysterious Wildwood. Stalk prey to find food, defend your new home from dark intruders, and discover fresh herbs & ancient treasures. Build a thriving town for all cats to call home. Get to know the residents, fall in love, and raise a litter of kittens!

Source: The Game Website.

boardgame.name: La desaparición de Jacques-Pumpkin
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Este es un one-shot para 3-4 jugadores a partir de 7 años, en el que encarnarán a niños y niñas calabaza que despiertan la noche de Halloween, saldrán en la búsqueda de su padre desaparecido, el granjero Jacques Pumpkin. La misteriosa búsqueda les llevará hasta el castillo de la Reina Bruja, una malvada goblin. ¿Conseguirán rescatarlo?

boardgame.name: So Wrong It's Right
boardgame.description: In the trivia game So Wrong It's Right, each question is simple, but it has five possible answers, so answering the right way — or in most cases, the wrong way, from shouting out answers backwards, to swapping the letters around, to getting the answer totally wrong — is a little tricky.

boardgame.name: Conquest: Spires vs Hundred Kingdoms – Two Player Starter Set
boardgame.description:
Dive into the world of Conquest: The Last Argument of Kings with the Conquest: Spires vs Hundred Kingdoms – Two Player Starter Set With proposed scenarios designed to ease you into the system of Conquest, the box contains three warbands and a commander unit for each faction, allowing two players to clash on the field. Whether you rally the might of the Hundred Kingdoms or command the twisted creations of the Spires, the objective is one and the same: conquest.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Marvel: Crisis Protocol – Heimdall & Skurge
boardgame.description:
Two mighty Asgardians join the ranks of the gods in Marvel: Crisis Protocol – Heimdall & Skurge.

Heimdall is the all-seeing Asgardian in charge of defending the Bifrost, the Rainbow Bridge. Chosen by Odin himself, he is Asgard's first line of defense against any incursion. Joining him is Skurge, a legendary Asgardian warrior known as the Executioner. Once his mind is set to a task, Skurge's will is as steel as the head of his axe. This pack brings these characters to life with highly-detailed, beautifully-sculpted miniatures perfect for fighting alongside their fellow Asgardians. In addition to their innate abilities, two Team Tactic cards give them even more options for unleashing their power in battle.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Aldabas: New Professions
boardgame.description:
Mini-expansion that introduces three new Professions, each with their own powers and scoring conditions.

Bankers can steal coins from other players' vaults, and they love when you use money to influence people.

Merchants multiple your profits when you gain coins, and they reward a focus on one door color.

Doctors are welcome everywhere, allowing you to switch doors from one place to another and they award points directly at the end of the game.

New Professions comes with rules for integrating it into your games, creating whole new cardplay possibilities.
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Organizations: Game Designers of North Carolina

boardgame.name: Deities of the Old Kingdom
boardgame.description:
The heretic pharaoh Akhenaten has abandoned you and the other old gods. He worships only his new Sun God, Aten. The people follow their leader blindly, leaving you weak and crumbling.

By influencing the six Domains of Egypt, you and your rivals will slowly take back some of your powers. Through common spells and mighty enchantments, you will eventually have power enough to bring forth an eclipse powerful enough to stop the Sun God and his favored pharaoh. All while struggling to be the most powerful god by the end. 

Deities of the Old Kingdom is a puzzle game about manipulating a dice grid to gain the resources you need.

Each turn, you'll roll three dice and push some of them into the 5x5 dice grid. Connect as many symbols as possible to gain the resources you need. Spend your resources to unlock enchantments and - by the very end - your own unique Eclipse spell.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Ansagrams
boardgame.description:
Ansagrams is a quiz game that tests more than just your general knowledge.

Each card has five general knowledge questions on the front and a random letter on the back. Players each attempt to answer these questions as quickly as possible, but all you're really looking for is the first letter to each answer as you need to take those five letters and anagram them into a five-letter word. Do this first, and you win the card. Be the first player to spell a three-letter word with the cards you've won, and you win the game.

boardgame.name: Bye-Bye Black Sheep: 2022 Promo card – Cheese Thief
boardgame.description:
Cheese Thief:
If this card is drawn one of the players who has the most different animal types in his zoo has to discard one animal card and has to put it under the deck. The player who has drawn the card will choose the animal card to be discarded.

boardgame.name: Dragon's Dogma 2
Dragon's Dogma II
boardgame.description: Sequel

boardgame.name: Egg Slam!
boardgame.description:
Egg Slam! is a color-mixing game in which players race to call out the colors of eggs laid by the rainbow birds.

The deck consists of cards that birds in red, yellow, or blue with a background color that doesn't match the bird as well as egg cards that feature a rainbow either in the center or on the background. Place three cards face up in separate piles, then split the deck equally among players.

Players take turns flipping a card from their deck onto a pile. When an egg card lands on a pile, you need to yell out the color you get when you combine the colors of the birds (or backgrounds) on the other two piles depending upon whether the rainbow is on the egg itself or on the background. Whoever calls out the correct color first wins the egg card, and once the decks are exhausted, whoever has collected the most eggs wins.

boardgame.name: Bye-Bye Black Sheep: 2022 Promo card – Heidelbaer
boardgame.description:
Heidelbaer:
If this card is drawn every player gives all his hand cards to the player sitting left to him.

boardgame.name: A Forest of Memories
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

A caravan is attacked and afterward, someone is behaving strangely.
There’s probably nothing to do about that…

CONTENT WARNING: memory loss, possible phobia trigger (spiders)

A Forest of Memories is written and published in connection with Arcon38.
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-WBW Dungeoncraft, The Wild Beyond the Witchlight

boardgame.name: The Multivertshus
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

A Two-Hour Adventure for Tier 1 Characters. Optimized for APL 3.

You know how it goes: “You’re in a tavern…” But what a tavern!

At the Multivertshus, anything (and everything) can (and will) happen.

CONTENT WARNING: alcohol (mention), poverty

The Multivertshus is written and published in connection with Arcon38, a board game and roleplay convention held on 17.-20.06.2022 in Oslo, Norway.

The goal has been to write an adventure that is easy to pick up and run during a convention slot.
boardgame.rpgseries: DC-WBW Dungeoncraft, The Wild Beyond the Witchlight

boardgame.name: Godtear: Skullbreaker, The Dragon Slayer
boardgame.description:
Skullbreaker. The one they call the Dragon Slayer. An orc so strong he wields the jawbone of a slain dragon as a weapon. His followers are dubbed the Tooth Bearers: acolytes deemed worthy of a single tooth from his dragon jaw blade, a trophy of Skullbreaker’s many hunts.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Killer Summer Camp Survival
Summer Camper Survival
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Enter this rules lite, asymmetric, map based, survival RPG. This game pits 1 player against 2 or more, so grab a friend and prepare for mayhem.

Pitting Camper vs. Killer this game gives the campers the tools they need to survive, and eventually escape the ever present nightmare that they find themselves in. But watch out! The killers have killer specific skills to capture the campers. Strategize the best you can and outsmart the other player(s).

Grab 3-6 people and enjoy the chaos.

boardgame.name: We're All Gonna Die
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

From the mind of famed schlock director Bobby Dudecowski comes We're All Gonna Die! In this rules-light horror comedy game, players take on the roles of hapless horror movie protagonists trying to survive the night - probably in a camp - while the Sleazeball director tries to make the best horror movie he can! Blood will be spilled! Laughs will be had! Drinks will probably get on character sheets!

IT'S A BLOOD BATH OF HILARITY!

boardgame.name: Tiles of the World
boardgame.description:
Take on the role of the great leaders of the past to build your own Ancient City.

Each player will use their Gold each round to build tiles that will increase their city's economy. A city that produces more food and generates commerce brings more population. Make your city grow!

There are 5 types of buildings, and each of them provides a type of resource that will make your city evolve from a simple settlement to the largest city in the world. If your buildings are completely enclosed from all sides, you've created a very well-planned city block. This will earn you a lot of points.

To place new buildings to your city, you will also need a lot of roads. Adjacency with roads will allow you to place buildings further away from the map. This will reach natural resources, which in addition to other benefits, bring victory points.

As important as the buildings, are its monuments and wonders tokens. This will bring you a lot of victory points, but will consume all your Gold. Be wise in choosing when and where to place it. Each monument requires buildings, roads, natural resources or even water in its adjacency to be placed. It won't be easy to fit them into your city, but the benefits will be great.

If your Gold runs out, your turn is also over. Once all players have spent their Gold, a new round will begin and new buildings and roads will be available to everyone.

In the end, as soon as a player reaches the maximum population limit, the leader of the best city in the ancient world will be the winner of Tiles of the World!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Whispering Hollow Wilderness Retreat
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Welcome to Whispering Hollow Wilderness Retreat, a camp for girls, nestled in the Appalachian Mountains of Transylvania County, North Carolina. Established in 1986, the camp is owned and operated by Jeannie Lichlyter, fondly known as Aunt Jeannie by the campers.

The camp has always been a place to empower young women and teach them various life skills, but most importantly, the camp helps build lifelong bonds and friendships amongst the campers.

This especially occurs when the campers find themselves in constant life or death situations, face-to-face with dangerous and bizarre cryptids, and lacking any real adult guidance. But the campers wouldn’t change a thing at Whispering Hollow.

Whispering Hollow Wilderness Retreat is a complete roleplaying game for experienced Gamemasters and imaginative players.

boardgame.name: PocketQuest 2022 Starter Kit
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Announcing DriveThruRPG’s first-ever game design jam! PocketQuest challenges you to design a themed, pocket-size TTRPG in two months — the perfect opportunity for aspiring designers to get their feet wet and for seasoned designers to join the community fun.

Why should I accept this quest?

First-Timer Support. Our PocketQuest starter kit includes templates, guides, and graphics to help you get started creating and marketing your game. It’s a great time to become a new publisher!

Step into the Spotlight. We’re celebrating all things PocketQuest in August, including featuring submissions on the DriveThruRPG front page, newsletters, and social media pages.

Earn Badges. Earn and share badges for your PocketQuest submission and for supporting other publishers in the community. More information about badges can be found in the PocketQuest starter kit.

What are the PocketQuest design jam’s rules?

Rules Lite. PocketQuest 2022 submissions should be no longer than 20 pages and act as standalone games. Ideal submissions are concise and easy-to-learn.

Themed. Pocketquest 2022’s theme is SUMMER CAMP. Whether it’s a light-hearted fishing sim or a cryptid horror game to rival campfire stories, anything goes as long as it’s inspired by the theme.

Deadline. PocketQuest 2022 submissions must be uploaded by August 1, 2022 @ 10am ET. See below for more upload instructions.

PocketQuest2022. Want us to see your ideas and discussions? Use hashtag #PocketQuest2022 during the challenge, so we can boost your creativity!

Optional Template. The templates in the PocketQuest starter kit are optional. If you already have the design and layout chops, go ahead and do what you like!

boardgame.name: A Pair of Megadungeon Rooms
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

It’s nice to have a big dungeon, but there’s no need to build it all at once. Such places are wild, with disparate sights to see and challenges to challenge—often of unknown origin.

These are a pair of rooms to be slotted into such a place.

“This Better Be Good” has the PC party coming upon a team of goblins seeking treasure. The treasure is down there, but it’ll take some cleverness to get at it.

“Captured!” is a good room to have around when party members are defeated without immediate hope of rescue. There may be circumstances where—instead of just killing them—intelligent foes would be expected to cart the PCs off to be dealt with by their master. Well: this is where they cart them to.

boardgame.name: Loot Your Brain: Das Videospiele-Quiz
boardgame.description:
Loot Your Brain - Das Videospiele-Quiz is a quiz game about video games for 2 – 4 players. The goal of the game is to be the first to reach the last field with a lot of knowledge about video games, clever tactical playing of the lootbox-cards and a little luck.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Bordeando la Costa de las Sirenas
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Tras una buena temporada de encargos en alta mar, los aventureros reciben una última propuesta antes de un merecido descanso: entregar una mercancía en el archipiélago de Las Sirenas. Cuatro días de navegación y 50 monedas de oro sería toda una ganga… si no fuera por las leyendas funestas de criaturas horripilantes y desapariciones que rodean la Costa de las Sirenas.

boardgame.name: El reino de Dak'zu
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Viajando por el Mar Ardiente, habéis quedado atrapados en la mazmorra subterránea del líder gnomo Dak’zu, exterminado tras el alzamiento de los Oyhun. Los pasillos y estancias están plagados de mecanismos y tecnología que desconocéis. ¿Qué secretos y amenazas oculta este lugar?¿Conseguiréis escapar?
boardgame.rpgproducer: Ana Belén Herrera de la Cruz

boardgame.name: Las máscaras del bardo
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

La aventura transcurre en Puntafría, un pueblo excavado en un gran saliente de tierra que surge desde la costa. La mayoría de su población es enana, aunque en los últimos años se han asentado muchos humanos. Los enanos, organizados por el alcalde, copan todos los negocios, en especial el más lucrativo del lugar: el astillero.

boardgame.name: El rostro de la ambición
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Nada más entrar en Narë, os caen los guardias encima. Estáis detenidos por asesinato y vais a ser juzgados por el consejo... ¡pero sois inocentes! Tenéis tan solo dos días para descubrir quién os ha incriminado y demostrar vuestra inocencia antes de que os metan entre rejas una buena temporada.
boardgame.rpgproducer: Ana Belén Herrera de la Cruz

boardgame.name: El templo del Dios que se arrastra
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

La gastronomía de Günderbot es de reconocida fama en toda la península de Garen, y los personajes jugadores han decidido desviarse hacia ahí en su ruta por la Región de los Bosques. En esta zona todos parecen felices, quizá por tener la barriga llena de tan deliciosos manjares, pero cuando empiezan a comer…

boardgame.name: Naturaleza disforme
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Los pueblos fronterizos de Heyrä están sufriendo una serie de ataques de extrañas criaturas que provienen de las Tierras Medias. Muchos de sus habitantes han desaparecido y los que quedan están uniendo fuerzas para adentrarse en el bosque y acabar con esta amenaza... Y vosotros os acabáis de unir a una de estas expediciones.
boardgame.rpgproducer: Ana Belén Herrera de la Cruz

boardgame.name: El azote azul de la Mina Mûr
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Algo está sucediendo en la mina Mûr. A los accidentes de las últimas semanas y las intrigas del marqués de Shmorna, se suma la propagación de una nueva variante de la enfermedad del azulón que está haciendo estragos entre los mineros. El origen parece encontrarse en la galería 3Dimtri, el lugar más profundo de la mina donde se guardan oscuros secretos.

boardgame.name: El árbol del ahorcado
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

En el Condado del Roble Negro se está preparando una boda para restaurar el antiguo esplendor de la familia Maynard y traer prosperidad al pueblo. Pero los personajes jugadores, contratados para escoltar al cortejo de la novia, pronto comprueban que tal vez no sea una ocasión tan feliz como parece.

boardgame.name: Crisis Core: Final Fantasy 7 - Reunion
Crisis Core: Final Fantasy 7 Remake
Crisis Core: Final Fantasy VII - Reunion
Crisis Core: Final Fantasy VII Remake
boardgame.description: remake

boardgame.name: Langskip: The Card Game
boardgame.description:
Inspired by the Norse sagas and the many vibrant cultures of the Viking Age, Langskip challenges players to build the ultimate Longship. Choose your captain, gather a motley crew, and use any means necessary to out-sail and out-wit your fellow players in the quest for plunder.

The strategic heart of Langskip is about racing to see who can amass the most loot over four rounds by raiding and trading with historic Targets and surviving dangerous Longships.
Each turn players strengthen and refine their Longship by drawing rooms and placing them.
As ships get longer, players can amass larger crews with a wealth of skills, strengths, and cultural backgrounds.
As ships get stronger, so do the longships that hunt you!

Players interact with each other by discarding cards from their Longship, playing Action cards from their hand, and raiding Trade routes controlled by other Captains. Action cards can disrupt, and even intercept other players. A clever captain can indirectly kill a greedy opponent, saddle them with a dodgy crew or build a Longship that can snatch victory from the jaws of defeat.

After the fourth round is over, players tally their banked loot and subtract any fallen Captains from their final score to determine the winner.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Un paseo por la nubes
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Un grupo de investigadores de la Academia Arcana ha desaparecido cuando investigaba la caída de un meteorito en la cima más alta de la región. Para encontrarlos tendréis que seguir sus pasos hasta la cumbre de la montaña y adentraros en el bosque donde han empezado a ocurrir cosas extrañas. ¿Correréis la misma suerte que vuestros antecesores? Solo hay un modo de saberlo.

boardgame.name: Survivance 2885
boardgame.description:
Survivance 2885 is a skirmish game for 2 to 4 players. Clans of 10 miniatures will confront each other through multiple scenarios or in a campaign mode. The game features a new FATMAX EDITION game system based on 10-sided dice, a new and original alternate activation, an evolution over the course of the game, multiple powers to customize your clan, optional managed non-player characters to spice up your games, various degrees of injuries. These are only a few examples of a game that is very accessible in its rules but whose tactical depth will give you a lot of pleasure.

—description from the designer

Une planète reculée de la galaxie est touchée par un virus foudroyant. Ce monde est la plaque tournante du commerce dans cette zone de l’univers, toutes les races y sont présentes et font des affaires. Placé en quarantaine stricte, sans gouvernement et avec 70 % de la population terrassée par le virus, ce haut lieu d’échange est devenu en quelques mois un territoire hostile et inhospitalier. Les habitants se sont regroupés en clans qui luttent pour leur survie. Les échauffourées sont légion.

Le décor est posé ! Survivance 2885 est un jeu d’escarmouche de 2 à 4 joueurs. Des clans de 10 figurines vont s’affronter à travers de multiples scénarios ou dans un mode campagne. Au programme un nouveau système de jeu FATMAX EDITION à base de dé à 10 faces, une activation alternée inédite et originale, une évolution au fil des parties, de multiples pouvoirs pour personnaliser votre clan, des personnages non-joueurs gérés optionnels pour pimenter vos parties, divers degrés de blessures. Ce ne sont que quelques exemples d’un jeu très accessible dans ses règles mais dont la profondeur tactique qui s’en dégage va vous donner beaucoup de plaisir.

—description from the designer (French)

boardgame.name: El fin de la venganza
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

El encuentro fortuito con Therkan, un paladín del dios de la luz, especialmente generoso, puede ser un golpe de suerte. Sin embargo, su sed de venganza y sus ansias por recuperar una reliquia robada han desencadenado el terror en Pinosaltos, un pueblo que oculta oscuros secretos.

boardgame.name: Cucú cantaba la rana
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Según cuenta la leyenda, oculta en algún lugar del bosque de Fangalnegro se encuentra la mina abandonada de Tim’rek, donde un gran tesoro aguarda a quién se atreva a internarse en sus galerías inundadas... y a enfrentarse a la terrible criatura que lo custodia. Aquel que desafíe los peligros del bosque y la mina puede tener una gran recompensa.... o un terrible final.

boardgame.name: La caravana
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Los aventureros se unen a una caravana camino a Madsbouth con la compañía de un variado grupo de viajeros. Todo normal, si no fuera porque una banda de asaltadores de caminos está haciendo estragos en la región y porque un peligroso asesino anda suelto por la zona... ¿qué puede salir mal?

boardgame.name: El vórtice interior
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

En la mansión Furhast, antaño un oasis de lilbertinaje y excesos, reina ahora la mediocridad y la decadencia. El archimago cayó víctima de sus propios experimentos y se ha convertido en una especie de portal que engulle a todo el que lo toca. Nadie ha conseguido rescatarlo... hasta ahora.

boardgame.name: La leyenda del Edhel Ruuru
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Gresh’buluk ha escapado de la cárcel arcana en la que estaba prisionera sembrando el terror y la desgracia en la región de Shmorna. Y vosotros tenéis la culpa. Ahora se os brinda la oportunidad de hacer algo al respecto, aunque para ello tengáis que volver a las profundidades de la mina Mûr, donde todo empezó.

boardgame.name: La ciudad de las dos llamas
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

La hija de uno de los burgueses más destacados de Madsbouth ha sido secuestrada, lo que amenaza con desatar la ancestral rivalidad entre los dos linajes más influyentes de la ciudad. En algún lugar de la Ciudad de las dos llamas una joven está sufriendo ¿podrán los aventureros salvarla?

boardgame.name: Cuando una llama de apaga
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Barjo Elvenflame, el célebre guerrero que tantas batallas ganó en el pasado, ha muerto de forma violenta. Parece que una criatura lo atacó y se llevó un objeto valioso. Ahora, los aventureros deben encontrar a esa critatura y vengar su muerte. Mientrastanto, algo ocurre en el faro de Madsbouth: hace días que emite un extraño destello y nadie en la ciudad sabe a qué se debe.

boardgame.name: Las sombras del Bosque Silencioso
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Tras huir de Huxe, los aventureros continúan con la búsqueda del edhel ruuru, la clave para acabar con Gresh'buluk. Las pistas que encontraron en la Fortaleza Perdida conducen a los bosques de Araloria, un lugar que, como pronto descubrirán, esconde ancestrales y oscuros secretos.

boardgame.name: Letargo helado
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Los personajes jugadores llegan al corazón del Bosque Silencioso con un cometido: devolver a la vida al edhel ruuru, último jinete dragón. Para ello, deben encontrar la entrada a Galanel, la capital maldita de los manië y evitar sus peligros. Necesitarán de toda su pericia para sobrevivir a la ciudad y sacar al edhel ruuru de una pieza para apuntar a un nuevo destino: las tierras heladas de Harkovir.

boardgame.name: Munnariket - El reino de la luna
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Una ventisca dificulta la llegada de los personajes jugadores a Kaltar. Tras algunos problemas iniciales, Kaltar los acoge. El invierno transcurre lentamente con la mente puesta en la primavera, cuando el deshielo libere la gruta y puedan encarar de nuevo al edhel ruuru. Mientras el enemigo realiza sus movimientos, tienen deudas que saldar: su guía, Urs, reclama la ayuda prometida para rescatar a su hijo de los peligros del legendario Munnariket.

boardgame.name: El pacto de Sumarfjall
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Los vientos del Gran Frío traen rumores de batalla, traiciones veladas y esperanzas envenenadas a Hankovir. La acción de los personajes jugadores puede determinar el destino de las gentes de Kaltar y el suyo propio contra su terrible enemigo, o precipitarlos a la muerte. Con la llegada de la primavera, el edhel ruuru surge de los hielos, aunque no como ellos esperan.

boardgame.name: La cámara de los olvidados
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

La influencia de un peligroso enemigo está subyugando el norte. La única manera de detenerle es averiguar el verdadero nombre de su existencia. Está custodiado junto con otros conocimientos prohibidos en la Cámara de los Olvidados. Nuestros aventureros viajan desde el norte hacia Saílias, en el sur, para pedir a la reina Sarala acceso a la cámara. Para ello, deben reconstruir la llave de Gaelis, afrontando la tensión y el bloqueo político de la ciudad, mientras los subterfugios del enemigo intentan impedirlo.

boardgame.name: Guthnar Sûl
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Gesh’buluk, un terrible mal antiguo liberado de nuevo al mundo, ha incrementado su poder hasta controlar casi toda la región norte: Araloria y la Cordillera de Shuutko. Amenaza con extender su reinado de locura y dolor por todas las tierras y, para ello, prepara un último golpe: encarnar el poder de Kragu, el dios de la destrucción, en el mundo. Solo hay una oportunidad para pararlo: reavivar la vieja llama de la alianza de los reinos antiguos a tiempo para lanzar un ataque definitivo y conseguir lo que sus predecesores no pudieron hacer, acabar con él para siempre.

boardgame.name: Septima: Metallic Wisdom Tokens
boardgame.description:
Metallic Wisdom Tokens for Septima in values 1, 5 & 10.

Replaces the Wisdom Tokens that are part of the game box.

Contains 48 Wisdom Tokens in bronze (30), silver (10) & gold (8).

boardgame.name: El clásico
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

La Ordo Veritatis en España todavía no tiene mucho poder. Debido a diversos problemas de índole política y legal no ha podido tener operativos de manera estable en la zona hasta hace pocas décadas, por lo que muchas de sus operaciones se siguen llevando desde el extranjero. Pero esto va a cambiar y el primer equipo con miembros residentes en Madrid empieza sus andanzas. Su primer caso, un hombre desconocido brutalmente golpeado hasta la muerte, no podría venir en peor momento: esta noche es el derbi Real Madrid – Barça.

boardgame.name: Railroad Madness
boardgame.description:
Railroad Madness is a family game for 2-4 players about building and running railway lines in the Old West. Players each take on the role of a wannabe railroad tycoon! The game will have you picking up pioneers seeking to make their fortunes in the Gold Rush and transporting them to new frontiers as fast as you dare…

Railroad Madness uses a mixture of real-time dexterity mechanics and territory control. The game board starts with a basic starting setup, and is then expanded during play: each turn, you’ll build a new section of railroad by drawing a Rail card at random, flipping it over, and adding it to the relevant area around the starting zone: North, South, East or West. A section of railroad made of punchboard is then placed on top of the card.
Once that’s done, it’s time to get those trains onto the track! Each player starts the game with one train station of their colour, and a 3D plastic train with moving wheels. The aim of the game is simple - transport as many pioneers as possible to a new area of the board, preferably as far from the starting point as possible. Your gold-hunting passengers are looking for new horizons!

On your turn, you’ll have to move your train along the tracks, picking up passenger meeples from Train Stations as you go and loading them onto your wagon. If one or more passengers fall off, you can simply pick them up again before continuing your journey. Easy.

But of course, there’s a catch: your turn is limited to just 15 seconds! Your frantic journey will be timed by the Controller (the next player in the turn order) who must keep an eye on the sand timer and shout "Stop!" when it runs out. During that time, you’ll have to keep your train on the track and your passengers on the train, moving as fast as you dare.

When you end your turn on an empty section of railroad, they get to build a Train Station there, unloading the passengers who safely reached this new frontier and scoring them accordingly. Train stations will generate new passengers at the start of each player turn.

While all of this fast and furious action is going on, the other players at the table will need to be paying attention. If your train passes a Train Station of their colour, they get to shout "Ding Ding!" and put a coin into their Safety Deposit box. These coins can be used to upgrade Train Stations, making them generate more passengers and money.

The madness continues until there are no Rail cards left. At the end of the game, there is additional scoring for area control. The player with the most train stations in each area of the desert gains extra points!

-description from publisher

boardgame.name: Cinco estrellas
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

En un hotel del centro de Madrid están ocurriendo sucesos paranormales. Uno de los huéspedes se ha precipitado desde el balcón de su suite y otros varios están heridos de gravedad a causa de lo que, aparentemente, eran trampas mortales. Todo parece indicar que detrás está la mano de algún comando esoterrorista, ya que en los móviles de todos los presentes en el hotel aparece la misma petición una y otra vez: «Traed a los futbolistas o mato a todo el mundo».

boardgame.name: Parroquianos
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Han denunciado la desaparición de un adolescente en el barrio de Carabanchel. Hasta aquí nada que sea especialmente extraño, pero poco después también ha desaparecido el policía asignado al caso. Todo parece tranquilo en el barrio; sin embargo, ciertos indicios apuntan a que un local de apuestas en las cercanías esconde un terrible secreto.

boardgame.name: Piramidal
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Una extraña llamada a la policía pone el alerta a la Ordo Veritatis. Al parecer una mujer está intentando vender los órganos de sus familiares. Es evidente que hay algo siniestro en este caso y los agentes deberán investigar qué se esconde tras las acciones de la asesina, dueña de una de las franquicias de suplementos alimenticios más importantes del país.

boardgame.name: Juego de niños
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

En una calurosa mañana de agosto, el conductor de un tren de Cercanías ha parado su trayecto al encontrar el cadáver de un niño en las vías. Nadie, en el madrileño barrio de Entrevías, conoce al menor en cuestión. Como el niño es un inmigrante subsahariano y parece cubierto por mordiscos, la policía ha cerrado el caso asumiendo que era un indocumentado que fue atacado por perros. La verdad es mucho más terrible que eso, pero nadie quiere investigarla.

boardgame.name: Patrones
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

El negocio del top manta no se limita a los últimos éxitos musicales, sino que abarca todo tipo de falsificaciones que grupos de inmigrantes ofrecen en las calles de Madrid. Uno de ellos, integrado por senegaleses, ha sido tiroteado y su líder ha sido asesinado a plena luz del día en lo que, muy probablemente, parece un ajuste de cuentas de una banda rival. A todas luces, es el inicio de una guerra de bandas… si los agentes de la Ordo no lo evitan.

boardgame.name: Retoques
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

La muerte súbita de un famoso futbolista en medio de un partido pone el alerta a la Ordo Veritatis. Todo parece señalar a una clínica para deportistas de élite que promete resultados espectaculares a sus clientes. ¿Qué se oculta tras esa extraña muerte? Y lo que aún es más preocupante, ¿cuántos deportistas podrían encontrarse en la misma situación?

boardgame.name: NSd20 - Juego de rol genérico multiambiental
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

NSd20 es un completo sistema de juego que te permitirá jugar en cualquier ambientación, pasada, presente o futura que seas capaz de imaginar. Inspirado en las populares reglas OGL, NSd20 toma el esqueleto del sistema para formar una experiencia de juego distinta y espectacular.

SIN CLASES, SIN NIVELES, SIN LÍMITES
Crea tu personaje desde cero con nuestro sistema de puntos y haz virtualmente cualquier héroe o villano que puedas imaginar. El sistema NSd20 no tiene ninguna restricción artificial y sí posibilidades ilimitadas: poderes psíquicos, magia, ciberimplantes… ¡Y lo que no encuentres en este libro podrás tomarlo de cualquier otro juego d20 y adaptarlo sin dificultad, porque la compatibilidad está garantizada!

RÁPIDO, ESPECTACULAR Y LETAL
Nunca el d20 había permitido una acción tan trepidante. A la simple elegancia del sistema habitual de acciones se le añaden interesantes mejoras que hacen del juego una experiencia más vertiginosa, como el sistema de niveles de salud compatible con los códigos de daño en dados o el nuevo uso de las bonificaciones para determinar la defensa o la iniciativa. ¡O las reglas de secuaces, que te permitirán combatir de forma épica con docenas de enemigos! Además, con las cartas NSd20 podrás controlar la iniciativa fácilmente y tener las estadísticas de todos los personajes a mano. ¡El combate nunca más será lento y aburrido!

TÚ PONES LOS DADOS, NOSOTROS EL RESTO
¿Fantasía medieval? ¿Ciencia ficción dura? ¿Aventuras pulp? ¿Space Opera? Todo lo que necesitas para desarrollar tu propia ambientación en está en este libro, incluyendo trucos y consejos para el DJ para convertir la experiencia de juego en algo realmente nuevo. Y si no sabes por donde empezar, te ofrecemos tres sugerentes ambientaciones llenas de ideas originales para que sorprendas a tus jugadores. ¡Y decenas de ideas para aventuras!

boardgame.name: El maizal
boardgame.description:
From the book:

Hace tres años fue detenido Arthur D. Lewis, conocido en todo el país como “el asesino de la Polaroid”. Arthur mantuvo en vilo a toda la población durante dos años en los cuales asesinó a un total de 42 personas: hombres, mujeres y niños. La total falta de un patrón y la aparente aleatoriedad de las muertes hicieron casi imposible su captura, hasta que una serie de circunstancias fortuitas hicieron posible su captura y posterior confinamiento en el sanatorio de River Side, de donde no saldrá jamás.

El modus operandi del asesino, que fue el que le hizo ganar su mote, consistía en asesinar salvajemente a las personas que había capturado, aparentemente por azar, con su cámara Polaroid.

Cuando se encontraban los cadáveres, siempre les acompañaba su propia fotografía en la escena del crimen.

Dos de los detectives implicados en su detención quedaron fuertemente marcados por circunstancias personales. Ahora, tres años después, su director adjunto les vuelve a poner tras la pista de un aparente imitador del asesino. Alguien está utilizando la misma forma de matar en un pequeño pueblo del interior de California llamado Ashville.

boardgame.name: Hijo Rata
boardgame.description:
From the book:

Es de la pequeña ciudad de Bird Valley, en el estado de California, de donde vienen los protagonistas de esta historia. Sin embargo, no merece la pena describir los más y los menos de esta pequeña comunidad, ya que no es allí donde se desarrollarán los terribles hechos que acabarán con la vida de estos individuos, o que, de lograr estos milagrosamente escapar con vida, les harán sufrir pesadillas para el resto de su existencia.

A varios kilómetros de Bird Valley, conectado a la civilización únicamente mediante una vieja y estropeada carretera que hace décadas que no se utiliza ya, se encuentra el viejo hospital psiquiátrico Carpenter, un lugar hace medio siglo abandonado y al cual rodean viejas leyendas y supersticiones conocidas no solo en Bird Valley, si no a lo largo de toda California.

Es en este tétrico lugar donde, una desafortunada noche de febrero, deciden unos muchachos aventurarse, con el objetivo de celebrar una inocente fiesta. Nada en el mundo podría haberlos preparado para lo que encontrarán allí…

Fragmento de la Introducción.

boardgame.name: Nidavellir: Trésor Royal Deluxe
boardgame.description: Box with 69 poker pieces to play Nidavellir.

boardgame.name: Fallout: The Roleplaying Game Quickstart
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

WELCOME TO THE WASTELAND

Post-apocalyptic adventures await in the wastelands of the Commonwealth!

A chance encounter with an injured member of the Brotherhood of Steel leads to a daring rescue attempt, conflict with deadly military robots, exploration in the ruins of an irradiated town, and a life-or-death firefight to liberate a new safe haven!

Based on the genre-defining videogames from Bethesda, Fallout: The Roleplaying Game lets you explore, fight, and survive in the fan-favourite, action-packed and exciting world of Fallout™.

This FREE 64-page Quickstart PDF contains all the information you need to start playing (just add dice, paper and pencils, and something to use for tokens):

Complete starter 2d20 ruleset for Fallout: The Roleplaying Game with plenty of hints and tips for new GMs.
The exciting adventure ‘Machine Frequency’ to begin your journey into the Wasteland!
Six pre-generated characters (including survivors, a super mutant, a ghoul, and a robot!) so you can pick up and play the game straight away.

boardgame.name: Protection Detail
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A notorious slasher has been arrested in the city and witnesses are ready to testify. The government believes that associates of the underworld figure may attempt an assassination on the witness so you have been hired to get the witness from point A to be point B. How could anything go wrong?

The scenario was designed for a quartet of third level PCs. This offering was a fantastic time for the Murder Hobo Inc. podcast show on Twitch. The series features a rotating cast for a two hour game every week.

boardgame.name: Salzenmund: City of Salt and Silver
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Whilst the chaos of the Turmoil subsides, an invigorated Empire seeks to leave civil strife behind and look towards the future. All eyes turn to Salzenmund in hope that it may provide opportunity and secure the Empire's coastline. It is a city of significant riches, for the nearby Silver Hills are abundant in precious metal and trade flows in from the Sea of Claws to the north. Cosmopolitan and vibrant, the cults of Sigmar, Manann and Ulric flourish here in relative harmony.

Salzenmund promises opportunity and excitement to adventurous souls. Explorers depart from the city to trade with fur-clad Norscans or brave the wide sea to Lustria. But the ruling Gausser family, newly installed and ambitious, threaten the stability of the Empire. The head of the family talks of a reconquest of the Wasteland and defiance of their old masters in Middenheim. In the taverns by the docks, vicious and crooked folk conspire in smuggling and piracy. Worse still, the honeyed whispers of forbidden cults entice the truly desperate into the worship of Chaos.

Salzenmund contains:

A guide to the history of this important port in the Empire’s north.
The makeup of Salzenmund’s government and their intrigues.
A detailed look at the most important locations and landmarks in the city.
Mysteries of Salzenmund, including a council of ghostly past rulers and an entity thought to be made of pure Chamon.
Details of how to manage smuggling operations and mining concerns in Warhammer Fantasy Roleplay.
Articles on the mysterious Spites that haunt the forests of Nordland, and the Goblins who infest abandoned mines and tunnels.
Player options for Characters from the city and surrounding region.

boardgame.name: Like Herding Cats
boardgame.description:
This game is the purrrfect answer to charades!

Each round the cats don cat mask blindfolds and act out one of 2 clues, but here’s the cat-ch, when acted out they may appear quite similar! The herders then group the cats and guess what they were acting. Work together to win as many cards as you can in 5 rounds. Unique and grammable cat mask blindfolds mean nervous actors can let loose their inner dicat-rio and mime like no-one’s watching!

Cn you tell the rollers from the rowers? Work together for the puuurfect score.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Manitoba Pines
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Welcome to Manitoba Pines, the pride of the Ranger Scout organization! For the last 57 years we have been rated one of the best youth summer camps in the nation. We have everything a camper could want: a clear lake, beautiful forests, and a staff second to none (that’s you).

Now that we have the common knowledge out of the way let’s get to the truth as to why you are here. Maybe you are here because you need a summer job, as many of you are still high school and college students. Maybe you just want to get some job experience. But the truth is no one comes to work at Manitoba Pines by choice. You are here by fate.

There is a side of this fine camp that few people outside of the staff know about, and that is a place we call the Back Forty. It is a section of the camp where the scouts are not allowed to go, and there is a reason for that.

Trust me friend, you will be doing more this summer than teaching 12 year olds how to tie knots and build campfires!

Manitoba Pines is a rules light horror fantasy game that requires only a d6 and a d20.

boardgame.name: Minecraft: Heroes of the Village
boardgame.description:
Adventure and fun await in this cooperative Minecraft game! Can you protect the Village from raiding Illagers? Explore the world, collect Blocks, fight Mobs, and build defensive buildings before marauding Illagers invade. Your helpful animal companions will stand faithfully by your side!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Subway Squeeze
boardgame.description:
Pack your carriage with passengers and don’t forget to mind the gaps!

Take passengers from each station and fill up your carriage before you reach the final stop! Carefully place your pieces to make groups of commuters, tourists, families, dogs and buskers; but make sure that pregnant passengers get a seat and watch out for the ticket inspector.

Score points for your different groups and lose points for any gaps left in your carriage.

This game is just the ticket!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Saga: Age of Invasions
boardgame.description:
SAGA Age of Invasions is a SAGA supplement which covers the era of the Great Invasions that ended in 476 AD when the last Roman emperor was dethroned. Divided between East and West since
395, the Roman Empire was under pressure from the so-called “barbarian” peoples: Goths, Germans, Persians, Huns and many others. The threats were many.

This little-known period has left its marks in our collective imagination, none greater than Arthur, the British chieftain who literary tradition raised to the rank of legendary king. It also knew its fair share of skilled generals and intrepid chiefs. In these pages, you’ll come to know the brilliant Aetius, the fiery Clovis, and the terrifying Attila.

SAGA Age of Invasions includes:

Warbands rules for Late Romans, Britons, Saxons, Goths, Huns, Picts, Franks, and SASSANIDS!

Eleven Dogs of War units to recruit, Four Old Friends, New Enemies varient Warbands, Four brand new scenarios, The Limes campaign system, New photographs, plenty of examples and explanitary text.

HUZZAH!

-description from publisher's website

boardgame.name: Black Rose Wars: Rebirth - e-Raptor UV Print Insert
boardgame.description:
This insert has similar size to the Black Rose Wars Insert and is designed according to the same concept, but differs in details. It doesn't feature acrylic elements, but the printing has been artistically covered with varnish so the patterns will shine beautifully. Insert has a multi-level design and includes six containers with a lids that have cut out rose symbol.

This insert is compatible with sleeved cards and does not require gluing, it has been made based on pre-production version of the game.

Insert designed for game with external box dimensions of 31.0 x 31.0 x 18.0 cm

boardgame.name: Black Rose Wars: e-Raptor UV Print Card holder
boardgame.description:
This officially licensed Card Holder with a Black Rose Wars theme is made of HDF with UV PRINT technology. It can hold up to 780 sleeved cards!

You can stack three elements together or use them separately.

Space for cards: 66x85 mm.

Card Holder has original arts from the games and is made in cooperation with Ludus Magnus Studio.

boardgame.name: Lost Ruins of Arnak: e-Raptor Plexiglass token set
boardgame.description:
Set contains tokens for Lost Ruins of Arnak with Expedition Leaders expansion:

1 Moon Staff
1 Starting Player Marker
27 Compass Tokens
27 Coin Tokens

Tokens have the same dimensions as original cardboard ones and fit in our insert.

Tokens have original arts from the games and are made in cooperation with Czech Games Edition.
boardgame.boardgameaccessory: Lost Ruins of Arnak: Expedition Leaders

boardgame.name: Sports Festa
スポーツフェスタ
boardgame.description:
Sports Festa is a trick-taking game featuring characters from the Sanrio universe participating in various sports, such as swimming, track and field, or jump rope.

It is a must-follow trick-taking game without a trump suit. At the end of each trick, the players look to see if anyone has achieved any of the public goal cards, such as play the 2nd highest card in the blue suit, or sit to the right of the player who won the trick. If a player has achieved such a goal, they take the card and a new one is revealed.

The game lasts one hand, and at the end of the hand, the players count the points they've collected from the cards they took in tricks and the goals they completed. The player with the most points wins.

boardgame.name: 触覚あわせ (Tactile Match)
boardgame.description:
In Tactile Match, players are touching 3D prints of enlarged produce textures feeling for matches.

Specifically, the game comes with 2 each of the textures of corn, strawberries, melons, and other produce; one each in black and white.

Each player has a hand of tiles for which they are feeling for the match from the center of the table. If a match is found, the player earns points. Alternatively, if the player finds either of the "expensive melons" in the center, they immediately earn points.

The game may end in a number of ways, and the player with the most points wins.

boardgame.name: Sirens: Battle of the Bards
boardgame.description:
UNRELEASED GAME




This game has not been released yet, therefore some of the information above may change in the future. Until this game is released, please don't submit images for it unless given direct written permission from the publisher which must be noted in the image caption.




Publisher's blurb:

The bohemian City of Salvata encroaches closer to the heavens every century. For a millennium, this towering metropolis has fostered artists, muses, and sirens so as to perfect their art and lure down a deity during a rare eclipse when the stars align.

Under the visionary guidance of the city’s Great Chancellor Calrath, Salvata has prospered in harsh desert conditions— conditions that forge coal into diamonds. And so, the City of Salvata is no different: failure is not shunned here but embraced as a stepping stone to success. Each century, another statue is immortalized, and the city climbs yet another step higher urging all citizens to strive for the vaulted halls at Salvata’s zenith.

With a full orchestral soundtrack, multiple endings, and new game mechanics to encourage exploration and improvisation, this 5th Edition, Tier 1 to 4 epic Campaign and Setting places your party not only in the crucible of conquest—but at the heart of a battle for the soul of a growing empire. Will you sell out? Will the city be ground to dust? Will the heavens be lured down and open before you? Will you join the Emerald Cabal, the Rebellion, or forge your own path? The fate of tens of thousands is in your party's hands.

boardgame.name: DC Comics HeroClix: World's Finest Fast Forces
boardgame.description:
The DC Comics HeroClix: World’s Finest set features heroes and villains from the Superman/Batman comics as well as three major sub-themes of the Metal Men, the misfit heroes of the Doom Patrol and a mystical sub-theme that includes well-known magic users such as Jason Blood as well as a collection of generic magic/supernatural characters such as witches, warlocks, apprentices and demons.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Outcast 2: A New Beginning
boardgame.description: sequel

Publisher's blurb:

The June 17, 2022 Friday Enhanced Map product contains a multi-layered PDF (allowing the options of white or black backgrounds, numbered or non-numbered areas, secret doors on or off, and grid or no grid) and a zip file with all relevant map files as individual jpg images.

boardgame.name: Intriguing Roleplaying: How to Add Espionage to Your Fantasy RPG
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Slaying giant serpents and confounding evil clerics is fun...and it might pay the bills, but nothing gets your PCs as excited as intrigue, espionage, spying and spy-hunting. Give your PCs a chance to walk coolly into a room and declare, “My name is Loadstone...Axegrinder Loadstone.” '

Whether you use modules or create our own fantasy world, if you are an experienced GM or newbie, this book will guide you in added spies and spying to your fantasy game … and create more amazing adventures for your players.

boardgame.name: Treachery Island
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Treachery Island - A Game Master’s Drop In Map For Fantastical Pirate Adventures

Introduction:
Need a map of an island for a larger than life pirate adventure? Need different versions of the same map? We’ve got you covered. This product features an island map complete with marked off treasure, resources, areas to explore, and various hazards. Included are seven versions of the map along with a page offering suggestions for numbered areas.

boardgame.name: Tanner's Crossing
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Tanner's Crossing
A Village Setting for Assorted Fantasy Tabletop Role Playing Games

After dealing with footpads, loose stones, and a terrible rainstorm you finally reach the crossroads of the trade routes. Near the crossing point there’s a smaller connecting road with a sign indicating that the path leads to the community of Tanner’s Crossing. You’ve heard of this place and the stories about the wonderful meals that can be had at the Sleeping Boar Inn. That sounds nice, as you could certainly use a real meal and a comfortable night’s rest.
